properties.name: Domain
properties.description: Indicates whether the Elastic IP address is for use with instances in a VPC or instance in EC2-Classic.

type.description: Indicates whether the Elastic IP address is for use with instances in a VPC or instance in EC2-Classic.

properties.name: NetworkBorderGroup
properties.description: A unique set of Availability Zones, Local Zones, or Wavelength Zones from which Amazon Web Services advertises IP addresses.

type.description: A unique set of Availability Zones, Local Zones, or Wavelength Zones from which Amazon Web Services advertises IP addresses.

properties.name: PublicIpv4Pool
properties.description: The ID of an address pool that you own. Use this parameter to let Amazon EC2 select an address from the address pool.

type.description: The ID of an address pool that you own. Use this parameter to let Amazon EC2 select an address from the address pool.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Any tags assigned to the EIP.

type.description: Any tags assigned to the EIP.

properties.name: TransferAddress
properties.description: The PublicIP of the EIP generated by resource through transfer from another account

type.description: The PublicIP of the EIP generated by resource through transfer from another account

properties.name: AllocationId
properties.description: The Allocation ID of the EIP generated by resource.

type.description: The Allocation ID of the EIP generated by resource.

properties.name: PublicIp
properties.description: The PublicIP of the EIP generated by resource.

type.description: The PublicIP of the EIP generated by resource.
